title: Reports of licensees
context: ยง157-27 Reports of licensees. Each licensee shall as required by rule or order of the board of agriculture, file a verified report on forms prescribed by the board of matters on account of which a record is required to be kept, together with such other information or facts as may be pertinent and material within the scope of this chapter. [L 1967, c 260, ยง18; HRS ยง157-27]
